# File lib/opensocial/appdata.rb, line 90
    def to_json(*a)
      value = {
        'method' => SERVICE + GET,
        'params' => {
          'userId' => ["#{@guid}"],
          'groupId' => "#{@selector}",
          'appId' => "#{@pid}",
          'fields' => []
        },
        'id' => @key
      }.to_json(*a)
    end
